name: Chopper 2 - GameClub
description:
Chopper 2 continues the legacy of Chopper, the best-selling helicopter side-scroller. Taking everything that was great about Chopper and
turning it up to 11, Chopper 2 features 36 action-packed missions over 12 unique and beautiful locations. Battle your way through widely varied
mission types while shooting for the highest score possible.

Chopper 2 is one of many fantastic games brought back to life by GameClub. Fully
updated to support the iPhone X, Chopper 2 and all other GameClub games will be constantly maintained for complete compatibility across new
versions of iOS and future iOS devices. Download and play Chopper 2 today!

**************************************************

Chopper 2 is playable for free, with some sections and features available only to subscribers of GameClub Pro, an optional auto-renewing monthly subscription which also removes ads. Besides the GameClub Pro subscription, there are no other in-app purchases in this game.
If you choose to purchase the optional subscription:
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. No charge will be made for the free trial period.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior of the current period, at the cost indicated.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your App Store account settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Terms of use: https://gameclub.io/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://gameclub.io/privacy
